original_text:
Then they will cry out to the Lord,
    but he will not answer them.
At that time he will hide his face from them
    because of the evil they have done.
korean_text: 그 때에 그들이 여호와께 부르짖을지라도 응답하지 아니하시고 그들의 행위가 악했던 만큼 그들 앞에 얼굴을 가리시리라

sentences.original_text: Then they will cry out to the Lord
but he will not answer them
At that time he will hide his face from them
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 주께서 그들에게서 자기 얼굴을 숨기실 것이라

sentences.original_text: because of the evil they have done
